chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
oiai: output_implies_applied_interface
aiii: applied_implies_input_interface
copi: causal_order_preserved_interface
iboi: input_before_output_interface
oci: output_correct_interface
ogii: output_greatest_id_interface

Goal:
forall (e : entry) (c : clientId) (i : nat), eClient e = c -> eId e = i -> has_key c i e = true

Premises:
Record output_implies_applied_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_output_implies_applied_interface { output_implies_applied : forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> key_in_output_trace client id tr -> in_applied_entries client id net } Arguments output_implies_applied_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_output_implies_applied_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Record applied_implies_input_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_applied_implies_input_interface { applied_implies_input : forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))) (e : entry), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> eClient e = client -> eId e = id -> applied_implies_input_state client id (eInput e) net -> in_input_trace client id (eInput e) tr } Arguments applied_implies_input_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_applied_implies_input_interface {orig_base_params one
Record output_greatest_id_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_output_greatest_id_interface { output_greatest_id : forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> key_in_output_trace client id tr -> greatest_id_for_client client id net } Arguments output_greatest_id_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_output_greatest_id_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
eId = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (e : entry) => let (_, _, eId, _, _, _) := e in eId : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), entry -> nat Arguments eId {orig_base_params raft_params}
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
eClient = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (e : entry) => let (_, eClient, _, _, _, _) := e in eClient : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), entry -> clientId Arguments eClient {orig_base_params raft_params}
Record causal_order_preserved_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_causal_order_preserved_interface { causal_order_preserved : forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (client' : clientId) (id' : nat) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> output_before_input client id client' id' tr -> entries_ordered client id client' id' net } Arguments causal_order_preserved_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_causal_order_preserved_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
clientId = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (RaftParams0 : RaftParams orig_base_params) => let (_, _, _, clientId, _) := RaftParams0 in clientId : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments clientId {orig_base_params RaftParams}
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
Record input_before_output_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_input_before_output_interface { output_implies_input_before_output : forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> key_in_output_trace client id tr -> input_before_output client id tr } Arguments input_before_output_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_input_before_output_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
has_key = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (c : clientId) (i : nat) (e : entry) => match e with | {| eClient := c'; eId := i' |} => (if clientId_eq_dec c c' then true else false) && (i =? i') end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> entry -> bool Arguments has_key {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
Record output_correct_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_output_correct_interface { output_correct_invariant : forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (out : output) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> in_output_trace client id out tr -> output_correct client id out (applied_entries (nwState net)) } Arguments output_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_output_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
correct_entry = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (i : input) (e : entry) => eClient e = client /\ eId e = id /\ eInput e = i : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> input -> entry -> Prop Arguments correct_entry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
maxIndex_removeAfterIndex : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e : entry), sorted l -> In e l -> eIndex e = i -> maxIndex (removeAfterIndex l i) = i
in_applied_entries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (net : network) => exists e : entry, eClient e = client /\ eId e = id /\ In e (applied_entries (nwState net)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> network -> Prop Arguments in_applied_entries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
output_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (out : output) (aes : list entry) => exists (xs : list entry) (e : entry) (ys : list entry) (tr' : list (input * output)) (st' : data), deduplicate_log aes = xs ++ e :: ys /\ eClient e = client /\ eId e = id /\ execute_log (xs ++ [e]) = (tr', st') /\ hd_error (rev tr') = Some (eInput e, out) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, clientId -> nat -> output -> list entry -> Prop Arguments output_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _ _%list_scope
contiguous_range_exact_lo = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (xs : list entry) (lo : nat) => (forall i : nat, lo < i <= maxIndex xs -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e xs) /\ (forall e : entry, In e xs -> lo < eIndex e) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> nat -> Prop Arguments contiguous_range_exact_lo {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope _%nat_scope
has_key_intro : forall e : entry, has_key (eClient e) (eId e) e = true
applied_implies_input : forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))) (e : entry), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> eClient e = client -> eId e = id -> applied_implies_input_state client id (eInput e) net -> in_input_trace client id (eInput e) tr
thing2 : forall (l l' : list entry) (i : nat), l <> [] -> Prefix l l' -> sorted l' -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l i -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l' 0 -> l ++ removeAfterIndex l' i = l'
applied_implies_input_state = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (i : input) (net : network) => exists e : entry, correct_entry client id i e /\ ((exists h : Net.name, In e (log (nwState net h))) \/ (exists (p : packet) (entries : list entry), In p (nwPackets net) /\ mEntries (pBody p) = Some entries /\ In e entries)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> input -> network -> Prop Arguments applied_implies_input_state {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
Build_applied_implies_input_interface : (forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))) (e : entry), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> eClient e = client -> eId e = id -> applied_implies_input_state client id (eInput e) net -> in_input_trace client id (eInput e) tr) -> applied_implies_input_interface
removeAfterIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix removeAfterIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : list entry := match entries with | [] => [] | e :: es => if eIndex e <=? i then e :: es else removeAfterIndex es i end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex -> list entry Arguments removeAfterIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
findGtIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix findGtIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : list entry := match entries with | [] => [] | e :: es => if i <? eIndex e then e :: findGtIndex es i else [] end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex -> list entry Arguments findGtIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
is_client_response_with_key = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (out : raft_output) => match out with | NotLeader _ _ => false | ClientResponse c i _ => (if clientId_eq_dec client c then true else false) && (id =? i) end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> raft_output -> bool Arguments is_client_response_with_key {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
is_client_response = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (o : output) (out : raft_output) => match out with | NotLeader _ _ => false | ClientResponse c i o' => (if clientId_eq_dec client c then true else false) && (id =? i) && (if output_eq_dec o o' then true else false) end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> output -> raft_output -> bool Arguments is_client_response {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
commit_recorded = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) (h : Net.name) (e : entry) => In e (log (nwState net h)) /\ (eIndex e <= lastApplied (nwState net h) \/ eIndex e <= commitIndex (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Net.name -> entry -> Prop Arguments commit_recorded {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
cacheApplyEntry = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (e : entry) => match getLastId st (eClient e) with | Some (id, o) => if eId e <? id then ([], st) else if eId e =? id then ([o], st) else applyEntry st e | None => applyEntry st e end : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output -> entry -> list output * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output Arguments cacheApplyEntry {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
is_input_with_key = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (trace_entry : name * (raft_input + list raft_output)) => let (_, s) := trace_entry in match s with | inl (ClientRequest c i _) => (if clientId_eq_dec client c then true else false) && (id =? i) | _ => false end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> name * (raft_input + list raft_output) -> bool Arguments is_input_with_key {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
contiguous_index_singleton : forall (i : nat) (a : entry), contiguous_range_exact_lo [a] i -> eIndex a = S i
entries_match = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (entries entries' : list entry) => forall e e' e'' : entry, eIndex e = eIndex e' -> eTerm e = eTerm e' -> In e entries -> In e' entries' -> eIndex e'' <= eIndex e -> In e'' entries < -> In e'' entries' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> list entry -> Prop Arguments entries_match {orig_base_params raft_params} (_ _)%list_scope
thing : forall (es l l' : list entry) (e e' : entry), sorted l -> sorted l' -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l' 0 -> entries_match l l' -> es <> [] -> Prefix es l' -> contiguous_range_exact_lo es (eIndex e) -> In e l -> In e' l' -> eIndex e = eIndex e' -> eTerm e = eTerm e' -> es ++ removeAfterIndex l (eIndex e) = l'
removeIncorrect_new_contiguous : forall (new current : list entry) (prev : nat) (e : entry), sorted current -> uniqueIndices current -> (forall e0 e' : entry, eIndex e0 = eIndex e' -> eTerm e0 = eTerm e' -> In e0 new -> In e' current -> e0 = e') -> contiguous_range_exact_lo current 0 -> contiguous_range_exact_lo new prev -> In e current -> eIndex e = prev -> contiguous_range_exact_lo (new ++ removeAfterIndex current prev) 0
removeAfterIndex_same_sufficient : forall (x : nat) (l l' : list entry), sorted l -> sorted l' -> (forall e : entry, eIndex e <= x -> In e l -> In e l') -> (forall e : entry, eIndex e <= x -> In e l' -> In e l) -> removeAfterIndex l' x = removeAfterIndex l x
eIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (e : entry) => let (_, _, _, eIndex, _, _) := e in eIndex : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), entry -> logIndex Arguments eIndex {orig_base_params raft_params}
eInput = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (e : entry) => let (_, _, _, _, _, eInput) := e in eInput : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), entry -> input Arguments eInput {orig_base_params raft_params}
eAt = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (e : entry) => let (eAt, _, _, _, _, _) := e in eAt : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), entry -> name Arguments eAt {orig_base_params raft_params}
eTerm = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (e : entry) => let (_, _, _, _, eTerm, _) := e in eTerm : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), entry -> term Arguments eTerm {orig_base_params raft_params}
cons_contiguous_sorted : forall (l : list entry) (i : nat) (a : entry), sorted (a :: l) -> contiguous_range_exact_lo (a :: l) i -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l i
Bool.diff_false_true = fun H : false = true => let H0 : False := eq_ind false (fun e : bool => if e then False else True) Logic.I true H in False_ind False H0 : false <> true
fast_OMEGA16 : forall (v c l k : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P (v * (c * k) + l * k)%Z -> P ((v * c + l) * k)%Z
S1T_deliver : forall (i : input) (s s' : data) (out : output), handler i s = (out, s') -> step_1 s s' [(i, out)]
raft_net_invariant_client_request = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (h : name) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input), handleClientRequest h (nwState net h) client id c = (out, d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_client_request {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
get_output' = fix get_output' (os : list raft_output) (k : key) {struct os} : option output := match os with | [] => None | NotLeader _ _ :: xs => get_output' xs k | ClientResponse c id o :: xs => if sumbool_and (c = fst k) (c <> fst k) (id = snd k) (id <> snd k) (clientId_eq_dec c (fst k)) (Nat.eq_dec id (snd k)) then Some o else get_output' xs k end : list raft_output -> key -> option output Arguments get_output' _%list_scope
key_of = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (e : entry) => (eClient e, eId e) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), entry -> clientId * nat Arguments key_of {orig_base_params raft_params}
maxIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix maxIndex (entries : list entry) : logIndex := match entries with | [] => 0 | e :: _ => eIndex e end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex Arguments maxIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
maxTerm = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix maxTerm (entries : list entry) : term := match entries with | [] => 0 | e :: _ => eTerm e end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> term Arguments maxTerm {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
sorted = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix sorted (log : list entry) : Prop := match log with | [] => True | e :: es => (forall e' : entry, In e' es -> eIndex e > eIndex e' /\ eTerm e >= eTerm e') /\ sorted es end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> Prop Arguments sorted {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
removeAfterIndex_le_In : forall (xs : list entry) (i : nat) (x : entry), eIndex x <= i -> In x xs -> In x (removeAfterIndex xs i)
deduplicate_log' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix deduplicate_log' (log : list entry) (ks : list (clientId * nat)) {struct log} : list entry := match log with | [] => [] | e :: es => match assoc clientId_eq_dec ks (eClient e) with | Some n => if n <? eId e then e :: deduplicate_log' es (assoc_set clientId_eq_dec ks (eClient e) (eId e)) else deduplicate_log' es ks | None => e :: deduplicate_log' es (assoc_set clientId_eq_dec ks (eClient e) (eId e)) end end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> list (clientId * nat) -> list entry Arguments deduplicate_log' {orig_base_params raft_params} (_ _)%list_scope
Inductive step_1 (P : BaseParams) (params : OneNodeParams P) : step_relation data (input * output) := S1T_deliver : forall (i : input) (s s' : data) (out : output), handler i s = (out, s') -> step_1 s s' [(i, out)] Arguments step_1 {P params} Arguments S1T_deliver {P params} _ _ [s' out]
get_input = fix get_input (tr : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output))) (k : key) {struct tr} : option input := match tr with | [] => None | (_, inl (ClientRequest c id cmd)) :: xs => if sumbool_and (c = fst k) (c <> fst k) (id = snd k) (id <> snd k) (clientId_eq_dec c (fst k)) (Nat.eq_dec id (snd k)) then Some cmd else get_input xs k | (_, inl Timeout) :: xs | (_, inr _) :: xs => get_input xs k end : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output)) -> key -> option input Arguments get_input _%list_scope

```coq
intros e c i H1 H2. unfold has_key. rewrite H1, H2. simpl. apply andb_true_intro. split.
- destruct (clientId_eq_dec c (eClient e)); auto.
- apply Nat.eqb_eq. apply H2.
Qed.
```
